## Thoughts in Chaos

Team Antioch is proud to release the conclusion of the [Antioch Chronicles](<https://www.sc2mapster.com/projects/antioch-chronicles-remastered>) trilogy. Created in collaboration with Ruben Moreno and Eric Dieter, the creators of the first two episodes, this campaign is the product of three years of development and a team of over twenty people. Come visit us on our new Discord to share your thoughts, bugs, or just chat. [https://discord.gg/m4wCpSf](<https://discord.gg/m4wCpSf>)





---

## Installation Instructions

Download the most recent map and mod ZIP files from the [files tab](<https://www.sc2mapster.com/projects/thoughts-in-chaos/files>). Unzip the **ThoughtsInChaosMaps** file into your StarCraft II/Maps folder and **ThoughtsInChaosMod** file into your StarCraft II/Mods folder. Open **ThoughtsInChaos/MapLoader.SC2Map**, then click the **Test Map** button. Save your game, then begin playing!



## Russian Edition

Interested in playing the campaign in Russian? You can [download the translation directly](</linkout?remoteUrl=https%253a%252f%252fyadi.sk%252fd%252fSEIgI06CtCkyDw>) or visit the [**StarCraft 2 Russian Preview** team's site](</linkout?remoteUrl=https%253a%252f%252fsc2ruspreview.blogspot.com%252f>) to learn more!

## Bug Reporting

We've done our best to test these maps, but no product survives first contact with the users. If you encounter any bugs, please report them in the [issues tab](<https://www.sc2mapster.com/projects/thoughts-in-chaos/issues>). We'll try to address issues as quickly as we can.

## Need to catch up on the story?

If you've forgotten what happened in *Psionic Storm* and *Negative Suns*, or if you just don't want to play them, you can [read a summary of their events here](<https://www.sc2mapster.com/projects/thoughts-in-chaos/pages/a-brief-history-of-antioch>). You can also [download the first two episodes here](<https://www.sc2mapster.com/projects/antioch-chronicles-remastered>).
